verses.verse: "But now those who are <S%H6810>younger<s%> than I have me in <S%H7832>derision,<s%> whose <S%H1>fathers<s%> I would have <S%H3988>disdained<s%> to <S%H7896>put<s%> with my <S%H6629>sheep<s%> <S%H3611>dogs.<s%>
Of what <S%H4100>use<s%> is the <S%H3581>strength<s%> of their <S%H3027>hands<s%> to <S%H3624>me,<s%> men in whom ripe age has <S%H6>perished?<s%>

They are <S%H1565>gaunt<s%> from <S%H2639>lack<s%> and <S%H3720>famine.<s%> They <S%H6207>gnaw<s%> the dry <S%H6723>ground,<s%> in the <S%H570>gloom<s%> of <S%H4875>waste<s%> and <S%H7722>desolation.<s%>
They <S%H6998>pluck<s%> salt <S%H4408>herbs<s%> by the <S%H7880>bushes.<s%> The <S%H8328>roots<s%> of the <S%H7574>broom<s%> are their <S%H3899>food.<s%>
They are driven <S%H1644>out<s%> from the <S%H1460>midst<s%> of <S%H7321>men.<s%> They cry after them as after a <S%H1590>thief;<s%>
So that they <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in <S%H6178>frightful<s%> <S%H5158>valleys,<s%> and in <S%H2356>holes<s%> of the <S%H6083>earth<s%> and of the <S%H3710>rocks.<s%>
Among the <S%H7880>bushes<s%> they <S%H5101>bray;<s%> and under the <S%H2738>nettles<s%> they are gathered <S%H5596>together.<s%>
They are <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5036>fools,<s%> <S%H1121>yes,<s%> children of base <S%H8034>men.<s%> They were <S%H5217>flogged<s%> out of the <S%H776>land.<s%>
"Now I have become their <S%H5058>song.<s%> <S%H4405>Yes,<s%> I am a byword to them.
They <S%H8581>abhor<s%> <S%H7368>me,<s%> they stand aloof from <S%H2820>me,<s%> and don't hesitate to <S%H7536>spit<s%> in my <S%H6440>face.<s%>
For he has <S%H6605>untied<s%> his <S%H3499>cord,<s%> and <S%H6031>afflicted<s%> <S%H7971>me;<s%> and they have thrown off <S%H7448>restraint<s%> before <S%H6440>me.<s%>

On my <S%H3225>right<s%> hand <S%H6965>rise<s%> the <S%H6526>rabble.<s%> They thrust <S%H7971>aside<s%> my <S%H7272>feet,<s%> They cast <S%H5549>up<s%> against me their <S%H734>ways<s%> of <S%H343>destruction.<s%>
They <S%H5420>mar<s%> my <S%H5410>path,<s%> They set <S%H3276>forward<s%> my <S%H1942>calamity,<s%> without <S%H5826>anyone<s%>'s help.
As through a <S%H7342>wide<s%> <S%H6556>breach<s%> they <S%H857>come,<s%> in the <S%H8478>midst<s%> of the <S%H7722>ruin<s%> they roll themselves <S%H1556>in.<s%>

<S%H1091>Terrors<s%> have <S%H2015>turned<s%> on <S%H7291>me.<s%> They chase my <S%H5082>honor<s%> as the <S%H7307>wind.<s%> My <S%H3444>welfare<s%> has passed <S%H5674>away<s%> as a <S%H5645>cloud.<s%>
"Now my <S%H5315>soul<s%> is poured <S%H8210>out<s%> within <S%H3117>me.<s%> Days of <S%H6040>affliction<s%> have taken hold on <S%H270>me.<s%>
In the night <S%H3915>season<s%> my <S%H6106>bones<s%> are <S%H5365>pierced<s%> in <S%H6207>me,<s%> and the pains that gnaw me take no <S%H7901>rest.<s%>
By <S%H7230>great<s%> <S%H3581>force<s%> is my <S%H3830>garment<s%> <S%H2664>disfigured.<s%> It binds me <S%H247>about<s%> as the <S%H6310>collar<s%> of my <S%H3801>coat.<s%>
He has <S%H3384>cast<s%> me into the <S%H2563>mire.<s%> I have become <S%H4911>like<s%> <S%H6083>dust<s%> and <S%H665>ashes.<s%>
I <S%H7768>cry<s%> to <S%H6030>you,<s%> and you do not answer <S%H5975>me.<s%> I stand up, and you gaze at <S%H995>me.<s%>
You have <S%H2015>turned<s%> to be <S%H393>cruel<s%> to <S%H6108>me.<s%> With the might of your <S%H3027>hand<s%> you persecute <S%H7852>me.<s%>
You lift me <S%H5375>up<s%> to the <S%H7307>wind,<s%> and <S%H7392>drive<s%> me with <S%H4127>it.<s%> You dissolve me in the <S%H8454>storm.<s%>
For I <S%H3045>know<s%> that you will <S%H7725>bring<s%> me to <S%H4194>death,<s%> To the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H4150>appointed<s%> for all <S%H2416>living.<s%>
"However <S%H7971>doesn't<s%> one stretch out a <S%H3027>hand<s%> in his <S%H1164>fall?<s%> Or in his <S%H6365>calamity<s%> therefore cry for <S%H7769>help?<s%>
<S%H1058>Didn't<s%> I weep for him who was in <S%H7186>trouble?<s%> <S%H5315>Wasn't<s%> my soul <S%H5701>grieved<s%> for the <S%H34>needy?<s%>
When I <S%H6960>looked<s%> for <S%H2896>good,<s%> then <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H935>came;<s%> When I <S%H3176>waited<s%> for <S%H216>light,<s%> there <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H652>darkness.<s%>
My <S%H4578>heart<s%> is <S%H7570>troubled,<s%> and <S%H1826>doesn't<s%> rest. <S%H3117>Days<s%> of <S%H6040>affliction<s%> have come on <S%H6923>me.<s%>
I <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H6937>mourning<s%> without the <S%H2535>sun.<s%> I stand <S%H6965>up<s%> in the <S%H6951>assembly,<s%> and cry for <S%H7768>help.<s%>
I am a <S%H251>brother<s%> to <S%H8577>jackals,<s%> and a <S%H7453>companion<s%> to <S%H1323>ostriches.<s%>
My <S%H5785>skin<s%> grows <S%H7835>black<s%> and peels from <S%H6106>me.<s%> My bones are <S%H2787>burned<s%> with <S%H2721>heat.<s%>
Therefore my <S%H3658>harp<s%> has turned to <S%H60>mourning,<s%> and my <S%H5748>pipe<s%> into the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of those who <S%H1058>weep.<s%>
